price: 45.Ama koros addunyal sinam Yallih diinik waasak sugteeh usun Yallih giti mako-le gita yakkem kaak faxaanaah gurrusan num kaa kataate waamkeh, usun akeerâ dabqal koroosite marah anuk.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَبۡغُونَهَا عِوَجٗا وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yaṣuddūna ʿan sabīli al-lahi wayabghūnahā ʿiwajan wahum bil-ākhirati kāfirūna
